thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 20 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Franklin Electric Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.17

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Franklin Electric Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.17
text:
Feb 20 (Reuters) - Franklin Electric Co Inc:
* FRANKLIN ELECTRIC REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 SALES AND EARNINGS
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.21 EXCLUDING ITEMS * Q4 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.17 * Q4 SALES $288.2 MILLION VERSUS $239.6 MILLION * ‍BEFORE RESTRUCTURING AND TAX EXPENSE ASSOCIATED WITH U.S. TAX CUTS AND JOBS ACT OF 2017, Q4 2017 EPS WAS $0.42​
* 2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE GUIDANCE TO BE BETWEEN $2.16 TO $2.28‍​
* Q4 REVENUE VIEW $312.7 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $2.13 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
